Although contraction bring oxytocin ( `` pitocin '' ) , woman need help soften cervix , mouth womb ( uterus ) , oxytocin start . Prostaglandins show ripen , soften , cervix ; present , prostaglandin approve marketing FDA purpose dinoprostone . Dinoprostone deliver several way ; one method use polymer vaginal insert slowly release dinoprostone directly cervical tissue . This product call Cervidil ( R ) market 10 year United States . Misoprostol another form prostaglandin approve protect stomach intestinal lining patient take NSAIDs . Misoprostol also use many obstetrician cervical ripen induce contraction , , approve FDA purpose . The company make Cervidil polymer insert make insert slowly release misoprostol . This study determine whether investigational insert contain misoprostol decrease time vaginal delivery compare Cervidil . Two different dos misoprostol test ( 50 microgram 100 microgram ) ; vaginal insert gradually release small , controlled amount misoprostol 24 hour .
